author: Adam Vaughan
title: There are many reasons why covid-19 contact tracing apps may not work
description: Many countries are hoping to use contact tracing apps to leave lockdown and suppress further coronavirus outbreaks, but the use of such technology has many issues
content:
By Adam Vaughan
How useful are apps for containing coronavirus outbreaks?
Steve Taylor / SOPA Images/Sipa USA
As countries search for ways to exit lockdown and avoid or manage a second wave of covid-19 cases, many have turned to the promise held by contact… [+5012 chars]
